member.name: Windows.WICConvertBitmapSource
member.summary: Obtains a in the desired pixel format from a given IWICBitmapSource.
member.param: The pixel format to convert to.
The source bitmap.
A pointer to the null-initialized destination bitmap pointer.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: Windows.WICCreateBitmapFromSection
member.summary: Returns a that is backed by the pixels of a Windows Graphics Device Interface (GDI) section handle.
member.param: The width of the bitmap pixels.
The height of the bitmap pixels.
The pixel format of the bitmap.
The section handle. This is a file mapping object handle returned by the function.
The byte count of each scanline.
The offset into the section.
A pointer that receives the bitmap.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: Windows.WICCreateBitmapFromSectionEx
member.summary: Returns a that is backed by the pixels of a Windows Graphics Device Interface (GDI) section handle.
member.param: The width of the bitmap pixels.
The height of the bitmap pixels.
The pixel format of the bitmap.
The section handle. This is a file mapping object handle returned by the function.
The byte count of each scanline.
The offset into the section.
The desired access level.
A pointer that receives the bitmap.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: Windows.WICMapGuidToShortName
member.summary: Obtains the short name associated with a given GUID.
member.param: The GUID to retrieve the short name for.
The size of the wzName buffer.
A pointer that receives the short name associated with the GUID.
The actual size needed to retrieve the entire short name associated with the GUID.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: Windows.WICMapSchemaToName
member.summary: Obtains the name associated with a given schema.
member.param: The metadata format GUID.
The URI string of the schema for which the name is to be retrieved.
The size of the wzName buffer.

param.name: wzName
param.para: A pointer to a buffer that receives the schema's name.
To obtain the required buffer size, call WICMapSchemaToName with cchName set to 0 and wzName set to NULL.

member.param: The actual buffer size needed to retrieve the entire schema name.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: Windows.WICMapShortNameToGuid
member.summary: Obtains the GUID associated with the given short name.
member.param: A pointer to the short name.
A pointer that receives the GUID associated with the given short name.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
